sqlMap.select: SELECT P.USER_ID, P.USER_NAME, P.USER_DESC, P.LOGON_NAME, P.USERGROUP_ID, P.ORG_ID, O.ORG_NAME, G.USERGROUP_NAME FROM T01_SYS_USER P,T01_SYS_USERGROUP G,T01_SYS_ORG O WHERE P.USERGROUP_ID = G.USERGROUP_ID AND P.ORG_ID = O.ORG_ID AND P.USER_ID <> '1' and USER_NAME like '%'||#userName#||'%' and LOGON_NAME like '%'||#logonName#||'%' order by USER_ID desc

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T01_SYS_USER P,T01_SYS_USERGROUP G,T01_SYS_ORG O WHERE P.USERGROUP_ID = G.USERGROUP_ID AND P.ORG_ID = O.ORG_ID AND P.USER_ID <> '1' and USER_NAME like '%'||#userName#||'%' and LOGON_NAME like '%'||#logonName#||'%'
sqlMap.update: update T01_SYS_USER set USER_NAME='$userName$', LOGON_NAME='$logonName$', USER_DESC ='$userDesc$' where USER_ID='$userId$'
sqlMap.insert: insert into T03_ARCHIVE_INFO (archive_id, user_id, user_name, state) values ('$archiveId$','$userId$','$userName$','1')
